house_listing.house_description: Investment opportunity. Sqft as per tax records. Property to be sold w/four property pkg. (636 counselor, 632 counselor, 4741 old hickory & 6016 edgelake drive.) $220,000 for package. Income $ 29,580 excellent rental histories.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Fenced, Foyer, Storage Space, Walk-In Closet(s)
